data.title: 'All My Children'- Characters
data.meta_description: The Tyler family was one of the first families when AMC debuted in 1970. Are you an expert on them? Find out now! All dates are American air dates.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. In what year did Dr. Charles Tyler pass away?

Answer: 1986

The Chief of Staff of Pine Valley Hospital passed away in 1986, leaving Mona Kane Tyler a widow. Dr. Joe Martin succeeded Dr. Tylor to the Chief of Staff position. Even though Charles did divorce Phoebe, they still maintained a close relationship until his death.

2. Did Phoebe ever battle alcoholism?

Answer: Yes

She did have a fight with the bottle but thankfully gave it up. Even though she became one with a drinking problem, Phoebe still managed to be a busybody in Pine Valley, scheming against various people like Amy Tyler, Kelly Cole, Mona Kane Tyler, and more. However, she always held a soft spot for her niece, Brooke English.

3. Linc Tyler returned to whose funeral in 2005?

Answer: Phoebe Wallingford

Linc came back to pay his final respects to his mother, Phoebe. Many other notable people from Phoebe's past paid a visit to the ceremony, like Chuck Tyler (Charles Tyler II), Kelly Cole, Benny Sago, and Tom Cudahy. The funeral consisted of Pine Valley residents reading some notes left by Phoebe in the case of her death.

These notes returned back to her past interactions with the many characters of "All My Children."

4. Which of these groups was Phoebe Tyler a member of while she was in Pine Valley?

Answer: Daughters of Fine Lineage

Not only was Phoebe a member of Daughters of Fine Lineage but she was also part of the Pine Valley Historical Society. This is where Phoebe got her reputation as a snooty busybody always interfering in her children's business. This is what made Phoebe the classic character she was.

5. How much money did Phoebe offer Eddie Dorrance to marry Kelly Cole?

Answer: $50,000

She paid him a whopping $50,000 to wed Kelly, but Kelly and Eddie never made it down the aisle. Kelly did manage to marry Phoebe's son, Linc, and that is where Phoebe did not like Kelly since she felt she was not good enough for Linc.

6. Phoebe also paid whom to lure Donna Beck back into the night life as a hooker, to keep her away from Chuck?

Answer: Billy Clyde Tuggle

Billy Clyde Tuggle got money from Phoebe to try and keep Donna away from Chuck. It did not work since Donna remained with Chuck. Sean Cudahy and Ray Gardner, while despicable people, have never been involved with prostitution. Fletcher was Randi Morgan's pimp and died back in September of 2008 when Taylor Thompson killed him in self defense.

7. Phoebe is related to Brooke English by being her aunt. Brooke's father and Phoebe are siblings. Who was Brooke's father and Phoebe's brother?

Answer: Ed English

Ed was Phoebe's brother and Brooke's father. I made up Tom and Adam English after two of Brooke's husbands, Adam Chandler and Tom Cudahy. James English is a take off of Brooke's son with Tad Martin, James "Jamie" Martin.

8. Who is Charles and Phoebe's only daughter?

Answer: Ann Tyler

Ann and Linc were their only two children. Ann wound up marrying Paul Martin twice and they had a daughter named Elizabeth. Elizabeth died of SIDS (Sudden Infant Death Syndrome) and then Ann died in 1981.

9. What woman did Chuck Tyler (Charles Tyler III) marry in 1982?

Answer: Carrie Sanders

Chuck married Carrie during that year but the marriage was short lived. Yvonne Caldwell never married while in Pine Valley, Angie Baxter has been married but not to Chuck, and Elizabeth Martin is Phoebe's grandchild.

10. Phoebe's daughter died in what year?

Answer: 1981

Ann Tyler passed away in 1981 and reunited with her deceased daughter, Elizabeth, in Heaven. Paul Martin, Ann's husband, just left town and has never returned since.

Thanks for playing!

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
